other_tests.findings: Negative for all markers of infectious diseases.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Positive for anti-HCV antibodies and HCV RNA during subsequent tests in December 1999.

other_tests.findings: Positive for B. microti on PCR.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stronger IgG reactivity in the August sample compared to July, with IgM reactivity stronger in the July sample.

other_tests.findings: Recovered methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and skin bacteria.
Marked periosteal reaction with changes consistent with osteomyelitis.
